      • doNewGame

      • doResign

        public void doResign()
        Current player resigns. Game ends. Opponent wins.

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
        (Draw a KodeKsboard pattern in gray and lightGray. Draw the pieces.) Load the images of the board and the pieces. Draw the names of rows and columns If a game is in progress, highlight the legal moves and the threatened pieces. For all threatened pieces, show lasers originating from the threatening combo.
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent
        Parameters:
        g - - Graphics

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt)
        Respond to a user click on the board. If no game is in progress, show an error message. Otherwise, find the row and column that the user clicked and call doClickSquare() to handle it.
        Specified by:
        mousePressed in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
        Parameters:
        evt - - MouseEvent
